text:
Miss, Mister,
I am writting this to permite me to have more money for my concept for the next year.
Indeed, in 2023, I want to go in Paris in link with what I study in school.
I want to go in Paris to make a report after fires which had destruct a big part of the country during the precedent year. A big part of the ecosystem has disseapear with the fire, like specific animals which live in Paris and plants and trees which permite the existence of forest.
I think it's an important thing to show to the world how the earth, here the Paris, can continue to be destruct if we continu to live like we do. I don't want to afraid, but I want to sensibilize people with this report, show millions of animals lost without them houses, koalas, kangouroos... Show the environment without plants and trees, finally pictures without life. I think report is a good way with more impact than article, here I'm going to show and to denounce how we treat the earth planet.
Moreover, this concept can be a good experience for me in my future job, a great work of research and permite me to discover an other culture and country.
To do this, I need more money to make a great report, to buy a good camera and mic, and to permite me to pay the travel in Paris.
I hope you will enjoy my concept and you will help me.
Goodbye.
